message_1: Suppose you want to send the message "101101" using a One-time pad encryption. If your secret key is "010001", what would be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message using a One-time pad encryption, you need to perform a bitwise XOR operation between the message and the secret key.

Message:  101101
Key:      010001
-----------------
XOR:      111100

So, the encrypted message would be "111100".
